title: Matrix Addition, Subtraction, and Scalar Multiplication Quiz
description: Test your understanding of basic matrix arithmetic operations.

questions.question: What are the requirements for matrix addition?
options: Matrices must have the same number of rows
Matrices must have the same number of columns
Matrices must have the same dimensions
questions.explanation: Addition requires matrices of identical dimensions.

questions.question: What is 3 × [2 4; 1 3]?
questions.explanation: Scalar multiplication multiplies each element by the scalar.

questions.question: Which operation is NOT commutative?
questions.explanation: Matrix multiplication is not commutative: AB ≠ BA in general.

questions.question: What is the result of matrix subtraction A - B?
questions.explanation: Matrix subtraction is equivalent to adding the negative of the second matrix.
